Description:
Get a start in life
Charming and neat as a pin, you will love the feel of this three bedroom home on a generous allotment of approx 592sqm.
The lounge room with split system air conditioner & easy sliding door access out to the private covered entertainment area.
The kitchen with plenty of bench space, walk in pantry & plenty of cupboard space.
Three spacious carpeted bedrooms all with build in robes compliment this superb home.
A very clean laundry with abundance of storage space leads out to the back yard that is tiered and ready to put your stamp on it.
A single carport leads out to a covered entertaining area to where you can relax and unwind.
Perfect for first home owners or for the astute investor and great for retirees with its low maintenance garden.
Minutes from shops and amenities and of course the sporting precinct consisting of the Clifton Springs Golf club and outdoor bowls club. Enjoy the Bay with its fantastic fishing and boating areas.
Do not miss this opportunity to live and play on the Bellarine with this well priced home.
Insights: 74 Bunganowee Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Quaint Home with Flavour
Home with a difference not your average three bedder ! This multi textured home has a spacious rear yard, single lock up garage and carport and views of the bay and You Yangs from the deck. Suited to the first home buyer or young retiree. This quaint, multi level home is well-maintained and neat as a pin ! Three good sized bedrooms, all with BIR, study area, spacious bathroom and north-facing living areas with a full length deck. Split systems and living room wall mounted TV. Block size 648m2
Close to public transport and situated midway between Curlewis and Drysdale shopping hubs and only a 10 minute walk to the water.
Insights: 44 Yarramundi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPLIT LEVEL STUNNER!
This wonderful split level home in a prime Clifton Springs position features an abundance of space for the entire family with glorious views of the bay from the upper level open plan kitchen, living and dining space with beautiful raked ceilings and fantastic entertaining deck. The home is complimented by two further living areas, 3 bedrooms including Master with ensuite plus study/4th bedroom and a central bathroom with separate toilet. There is no shortage of space or storage options with a double sized carport leading to a large garage with drive through access to the rear of the home and all set on a 585m2 approx. parcel of land with a desirable Clifton Springs address. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
The Perfect Start
The perfect start for all First Home Buyers, Investors or those looking for their next project, has presented itself in the form of this charming yet cosy abode. Situated within a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs and upon a large 666m2, the time to act is now!
Beyond the established and private front garden, you're welcomed by a delightful verandah that runs the length of the home and automatically offers a quaint cottage feel. Upon entry, you step into the spacious lounge room which offers immediate warmth with an exposed brick feature wall, gas heater and split system. The fully equipped kitchen offers electric cooking, dishwasher, ample storage and overlooks a separate dining area. The 3 bedrooms all sit from the central hallway and offer built-in robes and beautiful garden outlooks. The bathroom host's a vanity, shower, bath and separate toilet, while the laundry completes this simple but neat package.
The back garden truly offers a wealth of opportunity, with an undercover entertaining area and established tree's making it your own private haven! Also, on offer are 2 separate driveways, one equipped with a carport and access to the backyard, while the other leads to an oversized SLUG. Space is not an issue, as this block allows you to home multiple cars, caravans, trailers, boats and all toys in between!
This abode is ready for you to add your own touches and make it your own. Positioned only minutes from shops, schools, public transport and all local amenities, while the best of The Bellarine's wineries, eateries, beaches and the newly introduced Portarlington Ferries are at your fingertips. One thing is for sure - The Bellarine is the place to be! Secure your piece today.
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Four Seasons!
Positioned within a tranquil green leafy setting this contemporary built residence complete with all the modern comforts delivers a truly idyllic 'four seasons' lifestyle home...
-The spring bloom; a dazzling colour pallet of flowering natives and blossoms
-Balmy summer nights capturing cool summer breezes
-The ever changing landscape of a classic autumn
-Rolling green pastures of the neighbouring parklands over the winter months
A modern build approximately 5 years young; beautifully appointed to take full advantage of a highly desirable northerly rear aspect that boasts serene parkland views
Stunning light filled living areas of grand proportions create a welcoming 'home' feel
Clever use of expansive windows perfectly frame fully landscaped gardens and the enviable wide open spaces just over the custom built rustic fencing
The kitchen serves up a great practical space; 900mm gas cooker, stainless steel appliances and dual stone bench tops
A decked alfresco flows seamlessly from the primary living area and provides a wonderful entertaining zone
4 generous bedrooms; master complete with en-suite and walk in robe
A 2nd living area provides further flexibility to what is already an adaptable floor plan
An interesting twist and an appetizing feature of this fine property is the garage conversion into a fully equipped studio; complete with hot/cold wash, ducted heating, built in custom cabinetry and independent entry creates an obvious space for a home business 'or' an oversized 3rd living area. Alternatively the space could easily be returned to a remote controlled double garage
In line with the natural 'green' setting; this property possesses a number of liveability features including solar boosted hot water, cross ventilation and a privacy tint applied to the windows ensuring you have a home leading the efficiency stakes
The rear parklands are vehicle accessible via a laneway which further endorses this properties user friendly nature
Insights: 27 Carawatha Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
When Location Counts!
Situated with the 2nd green virtually at your back door, golf enthusiasts will be thrilled to stroll onto the course any time they please! Non golfers will also love the tree location and the feeling of open space on offer. The home itself has been well maintained and presented beautifully. Set on a generous 604m2 allotment with easy care gardens this home will suit buyers from all genres. Lovely sun-filled, north facing lounge room leads through to the formal dining -both these rooms overlooks the gardens. An open plan kitchen/meals and family space allows access to the outdoor living zone through double sliding doors. All 3 bedrooms are a good size with an ensuite to the master. The bathroom and ensuite have had recent upgrades. Single car accommodation. Presentation, location and affordability- a seriously great inspection!

Description:
Cloud 9!
Breathtaking uninterrupted panoramic water views will give you a sense of being 'on top of the world' and living on 'cloud 9'! A unique residence with an architectural flair boasting a cascading floor plan over three levels is sure to delight prospective purchasers looking for a 'one of kind'.
4 generously proportioned bedrooms and an additional study; the master suite possesses glorious water views and built in robes.
The primary living zone is without a doubt the 'money room' commanding bay views are framed by feature windows and grand proportions are complemented by a fully renovated kitchen (expansive 25mm stone benchtops, custom cabinetry, induction cooking, stainless steel appliances and excellent storage solutions). A gas log fire further enhances this property's charm and 'home' feel. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to an expansive decked alfresco to entertain and WOW guests!
Pardon the pun but the 'skys the limit' as far as scope with this fine property; the unique and adaptable floorplan lends itself to a myriad of living arrangements including separate independent living quarters
A 2nd light filled living area boasts a wonderful northerly aspect and steps out onto another paved alfresco zone; a lovely sheltered area to take in a morning coffee
An enviable prime land holding of 841m2 (approx.) is enhanced by wonderful established gardens; a selection of productive fruits trees, garden shed and 4500lt water tank with pump. The south-westerly rear boundary is flanked by neighbouring parklands which amplifies the neighbourless feel
This property presents itself as the ultimate sea change lifestyle prospect; the A1 location places you only a short stroll from the water's edge, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp is literally just down the road and a highly regarded Clifton Springs Golf Club is only a 'par 4' from your door step.
Simply too many features to list; all the modern comforts, fully powered work shop and more fine inclusions to be discovered upon inspection
Insights: 3 Bukatilla Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Easy Entertainer with some Bay Views.
So neat and tidy this home will certainly impress. 3 bedrooms with built in robes, ensuite and walk in robe to the master bedroom, 2 spacious living areas, central kitchen, laundry with ample storage, and easy care gardens. Timber floors to the main living zones, gas wall furnace and a reverse cycle split system.
This home is perfect for those who like to entertain. The large rumpus room opens out to a secluded paved courtyard complete with pergola, which provides excellent year round entertaining. Plus an additional large grassed area, with trees , shrubs and a garden shed on 585m2 block.
Long driveway to accommodate multiple cars, caravan and boat.
All you need to do is move in!

Description:
ENDLESS POTENTIAL - Needs a bit of TLC
If you are looking for an investment or a large family home with space to include an elderly relative or teenagers this property could meet your need. This property set on 585m2 (approx) and could be viewed as a 5 bedroom, 2 large living area home or 2 separate self-contained apartments. Open plan meals and lounge area with views of the bay and the hills in the background and a double carport. The house itself has a well developed moderate sized garden serviced by two water tanks and security cameras, solar panels help keep electricity costs down, 2 reverse cycle air-conditioners and a gas heater keep temperatures comfortable through the seasons. Closely located to Pinaroo shops, schools, several sporting facilities ( golf and bowling clubs, tennis courts, boat harbour, fishing platform and beach) with public transport nearby it is ideally situated. HOMES LIKE THESE DON'T COME UP OFTEN. Whatever your reason, the advantages of owning a property with a second living space on the same block of land are obvious and many. If you are looking to create the perfect family home, make your mark with a renovation project or secure a great investment in a capital growth area with maximum potential then this property should be at the top of your list.

Description:
Great Investment on a large allotment
Positioned on a huge allotment of approximately 1006m2 with plenty of space and privacy, this low maintenance property boasts an easy-care layout enhanced by bamboo flooring.
Comprising three bedrooms, 2 with BIR and 1 WIR, 2 bathrooms and generous size open plan kitchen/dining and separate lounge area. The well-appointed kitchen is highlighted by Caesar stone island benches with stainless steel 900mm freestanding oven, an abundance of cupboards with the needs of modern day living is perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Well located on the high side of the street, his solid three bedroom home comes with plenty of room to move with good access that would suit a trades person or anyone requiring room to park trailers, caravans or boats. Features include full length sealed driveway to the rear of the property, a large colour bond shed 11.3 x 8.3 m, suit workshop or car garaging for up to 2 cars or more with loads of inbuilt storage and bench space. Large in ground pool 8.5 x 4.6 m long, surrounded by established gardens.
Rarely does a property offering a lifestyle such as this come onto the market. Close to all the amenities of Drysdale, but offering remarkable privacy and flexibility that you will find it hard to look past. Those seeking a serene lifestyle, love to entertain, be surrounded by beautiful gardens and home, would like a short drive to wineries, cafes and restaurants, this property is a must to view.
Enquire today!
Insights: 13 Dederang Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Views, Versatility and Value
The views from this 2 story substantial home, set on an elevated block are spectacular. You will never tire of the simply stunning sunsets from the wrap around west facing deck with breathtaking water views to Geelong, the You Yangs and beyond. The flexible floor plan allows for a number of options including the potential for accommodating extended family and the possibility of Air BnB. Recently updated with new carpets and window furnishings, this 4 bedroom home exudes space, storage and easy living. Cooking a meal will never be a chore again with the open plan kitchen/living/dining all overlooking Corio Bay and opening onto an expansive alfresco deck. Also upstairs is the master bedroom with WIR and generous ensuite and a second main bedroom with direct access to the main bathroom, complete with separate bath, shower and WC. Downstairs the rooms are once again substantial with a huge living area opening out onto a covered courtyard, a large guest bedroom with ensuite, a cellar and a sizeable laundry with outside access. Wonderful extras such as ducted heating, solar panels and a ducted vacuum system all add to the appeal of this incredible property. A few minutes drive will see you at the boat ramp and the picturesque golf club, whilst just metres from the front door at the end of the cul-de-sac is a delightful playground and open park area.
Insights: 12 Parkway Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
POP THIS ONE INTO YOUR RENTAL PORT FOLIO
With a bit of imagination this home could be a gem. Build up so you can take in the magnificent views, STCA. Situated on an allotment of approximately 590 m2 in an established residential area has the benefit of being only minutes from the shore line, boat ramp, Golf Course and more. Constructed of brick veneer, we have 2 roomy bedrooms with built in robes. The airy open plan lounge, dining and kitchen has gas heating, electric upright stove and ample storage. The large carport allows access to the back yard and potentially more room for a garage or extension STCA. Should achieve a rental of $300 per week. Reasonable genuine offers considered.

Description:
The Genuine Article
This delightful 3 bedroom residence is a fine example of a home that boasts light filled living; dual bay windows in the primary living area provide an abundance of natural light to create a welcoming feel.
This honest home provides a wonderful foundation for a terrific lifestyle property; clever placement of the residence on the 607m2 allotment offers the enviable feature of dual rear access room enough for the cars, boat and even the jet ski. Neighbouring parklands, proximity to the water's edge and the rolling green fairways of the Clifton Springs Golf Course are only a short stroll away!
Three bedrooms; master complete with ensuite, built in robe and dressing room. The 2 additional bedrooms have built in robes
Beautiful appointed L-shaped lounge/dining zone exhibits wonderful use of windows highlighted by 2 sash style bay windows
The kitchen serves up a practical space; excellent storage solutions and 900mm gas cooktop
A sheltered and paved alfresco zone soaks up lovely natural light with its easterly orientation; a lovely space to take in a coffee in the morning
A double carport with rear access via secure dual timber gates; additional rear side access is available from the east boundary
The good old-fashioned backyard is a blank canvas and presents options a plenty only limited by one's imagination; a garden shed offers great storage
All the modern comforts, ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans and several other features to be discovered on further inspection
The vendor is agreeable to replace the westerly boundary fence prior to settlement; giving this property as new perimeter fencing (north, east and west boundaries)
Insights: 13 Bullimah Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Thinking About A Sea Change?
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac this 548m2 beauty will please all buyer types. Offering a flat building parcel with North facing backyard and wide street frontage giving amazing scope to build a spacious family home and even fit the boat or caravan! The property also enjoys an elevated position giving the lucky purchaser potential for a fantastic outlook. The location not only boasts walking distance to the beach but also a wealth of amenities close by such as Drysdale shopping precinct, Clifton Springs Primary School, Day Care facilities, Curlewis shopping centre, Clifton Springs Golf club and many more. With title available you'll be able to get started on your new home immediately. Don't hesitate and call today.

Description:
Investors This One is for You!
Attention all savvy investors! With tenants already in place until January 2021 at $460 PW in rent, this is a rare opportunity to secure immediate cash flow. Whether you're after a long-term investment or wanting to take the opportunity to secure your future residence, don't let this chance pass you by.
Positioned on a generous 581m2 corner block and fully enclosed by a secure wrap-around fence, this home will impress at first sight. Set over 3 split levels, the floor plan is cleverly zoned with family living in mind. The ground level offers 3 bedrooms, 2 with built-in-robes while the master offers split system heating and cooling, large walk-in-robe and ensuite with shower, toilet and vanity. The fully equipped central bathroom services this area, offering a separate toilet and spacious laundry with storage and side outdoor access. The upper level is the central hub of the home, offering open plan living, dining and kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and ample storage, all while encompassing picturesque bay and valley views from a stunning custom window and access via sliding doors to the balcony. Year-round comfort is on offer, with ducted heating, 2 additional split systems in the living and dining area and tinted windows throughout. Neatly tucked away off the dining area are timber stairs, which lead you down to the lower level of the home which offers a large 2nd living space, 4th bedroom and external access. The manicured and low maintenance outdoor space also offers an oversized garden shed and a large double driveway with room for multiple cars, caravans, trailers and all things in between!
With vast recent growth in Clifton Springs and the greater Bellarine Peninsula, this the time to act. With supermarkets, schools, public transport and all major amenities at your finger-tips and the Bay, boat ramp, beaches, wineries and the recently introduced Portarlington Ferries only moments away, there's never been a better time to secure your piece of the Bellarine pie.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property

Address: 97 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Join the Club on over 800m2
Exceeding all expectations from beyond the picket fence this quaint charmer will be sure to impress. Situated upon a generous 851m2 corner block, in a revered pocket of Clifton Springs just moments to the Clifton Springs Golf Course.
High fences wrap around the entire home offering fantastic privacy with established leafy trees and shrubs creating shaded sitting areas. Upon entry to the home, you are welcomed by an open and airy living area, which offers a garden outlook and sliding door access to one of many outdoor sitting spaces. The updated kitchen overlooks the dining area and offers striking black stone bench tops, electric cooking, stainless steel dishwasher and complete with a butler's pantry including ample storage, second sink and multiple power outlets.
Cleverly zoned, the master suite is positioned at the rear of the home and boasts a large walk-in-robe, ensuite with toilet, vanity and shower complete with sliding door access to the private garden. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are fitted with built-in-robes, while a versatile 4th bedroom/study is also on offer. The central bathroom equipped with shower, bath, vanity and separate toilet finish this retreat style home.
Stepping out from the dining area, you're welcomed by a large undercover area, which is home to a European style outdoor laundry. The undercover area overlooks the expansive lush backyard and is also home to an enclosed and raised veggie patch which also includes an array of mature fruit trees including crab apples, lemons, oranges, plums just to name a few! Wrapping around to the side of the home, you're welcomed by another decked sitting area which overlooks a manicured garden. You are truly spoilt for choice when it comes to choosing where to enjoy a quiet read or cup of coffee.
Features of the home include double carport, gas heating, 2 split systems, garden shed, fenced in veggie patch, new carpets throughout, freshly painted, new hot water system, renovated kitchen and doubled glazed windows at the fore of the home.
Positioned perfectly along the prestigious Country Club Drive, trade the car in for a golf cart because you are a short putt away from the popular Clifton Springs Golf Club! A short stroll to the Bay, boat ramps, public transport and with all major amenities and world class beaches, wineries and the Portarlington Ferries at your fingertips, lifestyle living doesn't get much better than this! What are you waiting for?
Insights: 97 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Bay is just steps away!
Play by the bay with just a mere 500-meter stroll to The Dell Beach or for sports The Clifton Springs golf club or bowls club. Immaculate 3-bedroom brick veneer family on a huge 928m2 block is yours for the taking. Large light filled lounge has garden & street views with a gas heater & reverse cycle split system. Spacious master bedroom has bay windows with a snap shot views of the bay, walk in robe & full ensuite. Open plan modern kitchen & dining is very stylish with a glass splash back, stainless steel 5 burner gas cook top & rangehood. Also equipped with another reverse cycle split system, white electric oven & grill, dishwasher, walk in pantry & an abundance of cupboards. Sliding doors off dining lead you out to a great undercover deck perfect to entertain under all year round with more bay glimpses & golf course views. The second living area has French doors, another gas heater & storage for the kid's games, books or DVDs. Off the hall we have very spacious bedrooms 2 & 3 both with walk in robes, backyard & golf course views. Central bathroom has separate shower & a working spa bath. Oversized double car garage with remote roller doors gives you internal access. Added bonus of an additional large 10x6 meter garage with front & rear roller doors, also double gates for rear access off the reserve. Plenty of green yard to play family cricket or kick a football & if that's not enough, walk out the gate to access a huge reserve. With the boat ramp only a few minutes' drive, the award-winning Bellarine wineries just down the road & lots of supermarkets, shops, cafes, ferry services, this is the place to call home!

Description:
Spacious Springs Seachange
Seeking to break into the coastal market or acquire yourself a beachside investment property, then this is it! Showcasing four double bedrooms, three living zones, two bathrooms and only 500 metres from the water's edge and Clifton Springs Golf Club and two minute drive from the heart of the Drysdale shopping precinct - everything you desire is on your doorstep.
From the central living and dining rooms there are water views across Corio Bay. This is where you'll be able to sit back and gaze out to the You Yangs.
First impressions do count and on arrival guests will notice that the premises are impeccably presented with neutral tones throughout. An oversized entrance guides you to the front formal lounge with the master suite situated opposite that occupies a generous en suite, WIR and ceiling fan.
At the heart of the home is a contemporary kitchen with a Bellissimo oven, five-burner stove top and dishwasher, as well as caesarstone benchtops. Built-in wall pantry and cabinetry provides an abundance of storage. Neighbouring this is a multi-purpose area with sliding doors for closing off from the rest of the house that would serve as an ideal space for children or a home office.
A second double cavity door directs you to the sleeping quarters with three double bedrooms, all with BIRs and ceiling fans and a family-sized bathroom, separate WC, laundry and linen press.
- Spacious brick home with four double bedrooms and two bathrooms
- Multiple living areas that can create one large space or be closed off
- Double LUG and workshop with internal and backyard entrance
- North facing established lawn and raised garden beds ready to make your mark
- Ducted heating and cooling for the entire house
- Embrace the Bellarine lifestyle and all it has to offer
Insights: 5 Coorumby Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding downsizer or premium investment opportunity.
Perfectly situated at the end of an exclusive cul-de-sac, 54 Delungra Avenue, will not disappoint the astute buyer, downsizing retirees or the savvy investor. On entering, you will notice the well-designed features with a spacious feel and distinction of this home. The stunning kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a generous island bench with beautiful tile flooring which leads to a sun filled dining area. Boasting 3 generous bedrooms, all with built in robes with the master having a walk in robe and ensuite. This impressive home has ducted gas heating throughout with an additional split system. The double remote controlled garage has internal access. The property is situated on a 462sqm allotment (approx.) and has an outstanding bushland aspect from the timber deck entertaining area. This well presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
